name: ESP
description:
After a catastrophic accident aboard a space station, an astronaut wakes to find herself trapped. With her life on the line, she races against time to overcome the Emergency Safety Protocol.

WSAD - Movement
SPACE/L CTRL - Up & Down
Q / E - Roll
F - Interact
C - Flashlight
ESC - Pause 

Made by 

Jesse - Programming & Design

Oz - 3D Art & Design

Shaka - Lighting & VFX, UI, Sound, Design, Writing.
